pullrequest.title: Logging Part 2: Inserting messages into a log file

content.raw:
I think the coverage should be judged by the final pull request ([coverage here](https://codecov.io/bb/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/tree/4657f372f5aa0f3792388e1f22f43b2560d1f5fc)). In this PR the coverage in `Log.cc` and `raii-sqlite3.cc` looks bad because they are full of defensive checks that should never be triggered. The coverage of these two files cannot reasonably be increased. In the case of `Log.cc` it will look better after part 4 because additional makes the percentage of defensive code go down.

Edit: Part 4 also adds SQL statements that use parameters which tests a significant chunk of code in `Log.cc`.
content.html:
I think the coverage should be judged by the final pull request (coverage here). In this PR the coverage in Log.cc and raii-sqlite3.cc looks bad because they are full of defensive checks that should never be triggered. The coverage of these two files cannot reasonably be increased. In the case of Log.cc it will look better after part 4 because additional makes the percentage of defensive code go down.

Edit: Part 4 also adds SQL statements that use parameters which tests a significant chunk of code in Log.cc.
